statements: DELETE FROM conversion_rates WHERE customer_id = 100 AND total_visits > 10;
DELETE FROM order_values WHERE order_id = 500 AND order_value <= 1000.00;
DELETE FROM conversion_rates WHERE id = 100 AND user_id = 500;
DELETE FROM order_values WHERE order_id = 200 AND user_id = 600;
DELETE FROM KPI_conversion_rates WHERE id = 1 AND customer_id = 100;
DELETE FROM KPI_analysis_parameters WHERE parameter_name = 'conversion_rate' AND parameter_value = 0.5;
